amendment.description: Amendment directs the FAA to initiate a rulemaking process to determine the authorization of Westchester County Airport to reinstate limits on overnight aircraft operations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in part C of House Report 111-126 to direct the FAA to initiate a rulemaking process to determine the authorization of Westchester County Airport to reinstate limits on overnight aircraft operations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lowey amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mrs. Lowey.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lowey amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
